multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; US inflation data triggers a sell‑off in industrials, dragging down the S&P 500 and tightening UST yields.

category.motivation: Article mentions the Federal Reserve's preferred gauge of consumer prices (PCE) increase, which is an economic data release.

article_node.title: Industrials Down After Inflation Data -- Industrials Roundup
article_node.summary:
Shares of industrial and transportation companies fell after an increase in the Federal Reserve's preferred gauge of consumer prices.

Chemicals maker DuPont agreed to sell its Kevlar and Nomex materials business to Arclin, a company backed by investment firm TJC, for $1.8 billion.

The Trump administration's firing of a critic of railroad consolidation from an industry regulatory board paves the way for a merger between Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern to be approved, said analysts at brokera...
